publications: [{"title":"Analyzing the effect of adding Bitcoin to your Portfolio"},{"title":"Extreme movements in Bitcoin prices: a study based on extreme value theory","description":"My second paper on Bitcoin. Deals with modeling Bitcoin's tails using extreme value theory. It got the best paper award at ICEFR, Prague 2019. Link for the conference: http://www.icefr.org/icefr2018.html"}]

honors_and_awards.title: UNDP Acceleration Lab Innovation Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: InfinityBox has been adjudged the winner for sustainable packaging by UNDP in India in its Innovate4SDGs contest! InfinityBox was showcased during the celebrations with Prof. (Vijay) K VijayRaghavan Principal Scientific Advisor, Govt of India as the guest. The Accelerator Labs with its founding partners, Qatar Fund for Development and Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development of Germany, launched in 2019 has over 90 accelerators in 114 countries.
